name: BRAND ECONOMIX
tag_list: brand, strategy, consulting, business-modeling, positioning, marketing, communications, organization, finance
overview:
BRAND ECONOMIX is a new kind of lean, fast-moving, international strategic business consultancy with bases in London, New York and Tel Aviv.

BRAND ECONOMIX does Strategy across all disciplines and for all sizes of organization.

We believe THE MIX – an alignment and integration of all the business elements – from Concept to Brand – including Marketing, Communications, Operations, Financial, Risk Management, Operations and Implementation is dynamic, unique to every business, and whose definition and clarity is fundamental to enterprise success.

BRAND ECONOMIX specializes in game-changing differentiation, strategic options, gap analysis, market repositioning and re-invention, financially evaluating all the implications arising – including where any potential change in strategy e.g. M&A, can suggest new opportunities for the best risk/reward solutions and future stretch.

We deliver our best results in teamwork with imaginative, ambitious, entrepreneurial managers; especially those that want their businesses to make a big leap.
